HomePage.title: MkSaaS
HomePage.description: Make AI SaaS in days, simply and effortlessly

hero.title: Create <flow>Flowcharts</flow> with <ai>AI</ai> in Seconds
hero.description: Convert text, prompts, or images into flowcharts instantly with our free AI Flowchart Generator. Visualize ideas, processes, and workflows in seconds — no design skills needed.

logocloud.title: Your favorite companies are our partners

tutorials.title: Flowchart Tutorials
tutorials.subtitle: Learn faster with guided walkthroughs
tutorials.description: Watch how we diagram real processes, follow along with screenshots, and pick up tips for building better flowcharts in FlowChart AI.

useCases.title: Flowchart Templates
useCases.subtitle: Kickstart your next diagram in one click
useCases.description: Grab a ready-made template, drop it into the FlowChart AI canvas, and tailor it to your process in minutes.

item-1.title: Customer Onboarding
item-1.description: Outline every touchpoint from sign-up to success, including welcome emails, product tours, and activation milestones.

item-2.title: Support Escalation
item-2.description: Track issue intake, triage, escalation tiers, and resolution handoffs so nothing falls through the cracks.

item-3.title: Product Launch Plan
item-3.description: Coordinate research, build, QA, and release activities with built-in checkpoints and go/no-go criteria.

item-4.title: Software Deployment Pipeline
item-4.description: Map code commits to staging, testing, approvals, and rollbacks to keep releases predictable.

item-5.title: Hiring Funnel
item-5.description: Visualize candidate sourcing, interviews, feedback loops, and offer steps for a consistent hiring experience.

item-6.title: Content Production Workflow
item-6.description: Move ideas from brief to publish with review gates, asset approvals, and promotion tasks already defined.

demo.title: See FlowChart AI in Action
demo.subtitle: Choose the path that fits how you work
demo.description: FlowChart AI meets you where you are—whether you're jotting down steps, capturing a whiteboard snapshot, or reopening a trusted layout—before the canvas even loads.

feature-1.title: Text to flowchart, ready to edit
feature-1.description: Outline your steps in plain text and let the builder map the nodes for you, ready for color, notes, and export.

feature-2.title: Image to flowchart without rebuilding
feature-2.description: Drop in a whiteboard photo or old diagram and our AI rebuilds it with clean spacing and editable labels.

feature-3.title: Flowchart templates you can shape in minutes
feature-3.description: Open saved flowcharts—onboarding, rollout, support—and adapt the structure in a few clicks.

howItWorks.title: Start in 3 Easy Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: No Experience Needed
howItWorks.description: FlowChart AI makes creating flowcharts as simple as typing your thoughts. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, you can go from messy ideas to structured diagrams in minutes—without any design tools.

step-1.title: Just Type What You Need
step-1.description: Start by describing your process, structure, or system in natural language. FlowChart AI understands what you mean—even if it's not perfectly written.
details: Describe your workflow in plain English—FlowChart AI handles the diagram generation
FlowChart AI supports business logic, software systems, and educational use cases
AI-powered understanding of both concise and complex process descriptions

step-2.title: FlowChart AI Builds Your Diagram
step-2.description: FlowChart AI transforms your input into clean, structured flowcharts using intelligent shape detection and layout optimization.
details: Automatically generates accurate diagrams with FlowChart AI’s layout engine
Optimized visual structure for readability and presentation
No need to manually draw—FlowChart AI does it all for you

step-3.title: Edit, Manage & Save
step-3.description: Make adjustments using FlowChart AI’s intuitive editor. Save diagrams to your personal workspace, manage your flowcharts, and return to refine or export when needed.
details: Edit using FlowChart AI’s drag-and-drop canvas—fast and intuitive
Organize all your diagrams in a personal FlowChart AI workspace
Export in Excalidraw format; PNG, SVG, and PDF exports coming soon

aiCapabilities.title: Image to Flowchart
aiCapabilities.subtitle: Turn screenshots, scans, and scribbles into editable diagrams
aiCapabilities.description: Upload any image, diagram, or hand-drawn sketch — FlowChart AI instantly detects shapes, arrows, and text to rebuild it as an editable flowchart. Convert screenshots, scanned documents, or whiteboard photos into structured, digital diagrams you can refine, export, and share.
aiCapabilities.sideDescription: Skip the tedious redrawing phase—FlowChart AI recognizes your rough inputs and returns a polished, editable diagram ready for the next review.

workflow.step-1: Upload any snapshot or export (PNG, JPG, WEBP, GIF)
workflow.step-2: Add an optional note so AI keeps your domain language
workflow.step-3: Open the regenerated flowchart in canvas to tweak and export

items.title: Whiteboard Sketch
items.description: Snap a photo of your brainstorm wall and let FlowChart AI clean it up into a tidy, editable flowchart.
items.ctaPrompt: Whiteboard photo of a sprint planning workflow with columns for todo, in progress, qa, done. Rebuild a clean editable flowchart from it.

items.title: Legacy Diagram
items.description: Import an outdated flowchart export and modernize it without rebuilding everything manually.
items.ctaPrompt: Old flowchart image showing onboarding steps: welcome email, account setup, product training, go live. Recreate a modern editable version.

items.title: Scanned Handout
items.description: Turn printed procedures and PDF scan-outs into structured diagrams you can edit and share.
items.ctaPrompt: Scanned operations checklist describing order intake, review, approval, fulfillment, delivery. Convert it into a clean flowchart.

features.title: TEXT TO FLOWCHART
features.subtitle: Turn plain text into professional flowcharts in seconds
features.description: Paste your notes, instructions, or ideas — FlowChart AI automatically detects steps, decisions, and connections to create a clear structured flow you can edit instantly.

item-1.title: Describe the steps once
item-1.description: Type the starting point, key actions, and decisions. The workflow engine keeps them in order and adds the branches for you.

item-2.title: Fix details without redrawing
item-2.description: Add or remove a step in plain language and the diagram updates itself without ruining the layout.

item-3.title: Polish it on the canvas
item-3.description: Rename shapes, drag nodes, or merge paths—the canvas reacts in real time, so FlowChart AI understands your tweaks without another request.

item-4.title: Reuse it everywhere
item-4.description: Export to PNG, SVG, or Excalidraw, or save it as your go-to template for the next project.

features.overviewTitle: Why using text to make flowcharts?
features.overviewDescription: Flowchart AI turns a quick description into a clear first draft, so you skip blank canvases and go straight to tweaks that matter.

items.title: Process Documentation
items.snippet: When a new signup happens, we validate their info, store it, send a confirmation email, and drop them on the success page.
items.description: Convert everyday onboarding steps into a clear process map.
items.ctaPrompt: A new user submits a signup form. Validate their information, save it, email them a confirmation, then show the success screen.

items.title: Decision Trees
items.snippet: When a customer checks out, offer 20% off if they’re premium. If they aren’t premium but spend over $100, give 10% off. Otherwise no discount.
items.description: Turn conditional logic into a readable branching flow.
items.ctaPrompt: Customer checkout flow: if the buyer is a premium member give a twenty percent discount; if not, but their order is over one hundred dollars give ten percent; otherwise keep the full price.

items.title: Workflow Instructions
items.snippet: Start by checking inventory. If the item is in stock, process the order, update the counts, generate the invoice, and email it to the customer.
items.description: Capture operational checklists without rewriting them as bullet points.
items.ctaPrompt: Inventory fulfillment instructions: check stock, when it’s available push the order through, adjust inventory levels, make the invoice, then send the invoice to the customer.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that works best for you and unlock FlowChart AI features that match your team’s pace

item-1.question: Is there a free version of FlowChart AI?
item-1.answer: Yes. FlowChart AI is open-sourced under the MIT License and available on GitHub. You can self-host and modify it freely. We also offer a free tier — every registered user can generate one AI flowchart per day for free.

item-2.question: What formats can I export my diagrams to?
item-2.answer: You can export your flowcharts in multiple formats: PNG (high-quality images), SVG (scalable vector graphics), and Excalidraw format (for re-editing). You can also copy diagrams directly to your clipboard. Access export options from the main menu (hamburger icon) in the top-left corner.

item-3.question: Can I manage my flowcharts and access them later?
item-3.answer: Yes. FlowChart AI provides a personal workspace where you can save, manage, and edit your flowcharts anytime, from anywhere.

item-4.question: What AI capabilities does FlowChart AI offer?
item-4.answer: FlowChart AI allows users to describe their processes or workflows in natural language. The AI interprets the input, handles intelligent layout and diagram structure, and generates editable flowcharts accordingly.

item-5.question: How can I upgrade or change my plan?
item-5.answer: Yes. You can freely upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan through your account's billing settings.

item-6.question: How complex of a flowchart can FlowChart AI generate?
item-6.answer: There is no strict limit on the complexity of flowcharts. The actual capability depends on the content and structure of your input.

item-7.question: How do I write effective prompts?
item-7.answer: Use clear natural language and structured steps. You may optionally upload reference images to aid AI understanding. FlowChart AI will then convert your input into a structured diagram.

item-8.question: Can teams collaborate on flowcharts?
item-8.answer: Currently, FlowChart AI is built for individual use. Team collaboration and shared workspaces are part of our future roadmap.

item-9.question: Can I generate diagrams from uploaded documents?
item-9.answer: At the moment, FlowChart AI supports text and image inputs only. Support for document uploads including PDF, Markdown, and other formats is under active development.
